tag_list: chicago-seo-company, chicago-seo, seo-company, internet-marketing-company, illinois-seo, seo-experts
overview:
Cardinal X is a top Search Engine Optimization company headquartered in Chicago IL. Our professionals and consultants have over 15 years of experience in the Internet Marketing Industry and significant history of success. We specialize in building organic strategies and plans to optimize our customers websites with the search engines algorithms of Google, Yahoo, Bing, and find the most cost effective way to increase traffic to the same.

Our goal is to help small, medium and enterprise companies to develop, grow, and maintain relationships with their clients online while increasing their visibility and profitability throughout their business vertical.
